title: Beginning swimming
creator_credit: Jorhal Pictures and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: Land and water drills are used in demonstrating basic techniques of swimming for beginners. Includes demonstrations of the crawl stroke, breast stroke, back stroke and back float. Shows how kicking, breathing, floating, paddling, stroking and pulling with the arm are co-ordinated in the American crawl.
